attributes.additional_details: The Government and Parliament needs to acknowledge that the referendum was called for reasons of political expediency rather than public good and must now act responsibly in its global leadership role and show the strength and determination to withstand the pressure to turn its back on our real and tested allies and to stand firm with our European partners to protect all our economic futures and security.
attributes.background: We believe it is the responsibility of Government to show proper leadership in the best interest of our future generations and to publicly demonstrate that this is not served by riding on the tide of isolationism. Our biggest threat is not from other world leaders but from our own foolhardiness.
